objectives.intro: Le cours ''Algèbre linéaire 1'' constitue le complément du cours ''Analyse 1''. Y sont traîtés les aspects des mathématiques qu'on peut appeler ''géométriques'' dans une acceptation large du terme. objectivesEn.intro: The course ''Linear Algebra 1'' is the complement of the course ''Analysis 1''. It deals with aspects of mathematics that can be called "geometrical" in a broad acceptance of the term. Starting from an intuitive geometric approach, more abstract notions such as vector and analytical geometry and computation in complex numbers will be developed. The construction of these abstract notions is done in support of numerous concrete problems, through which the student is led to simultaneously appropriate the theoretical bases as well as the methods and tools of calculation. (see also the objectives of the course ''Analysis 1'').

contents.intro: Depuis une dizaine d'année le mouvement des NoSQL et bigdata a pris de plus en plus d'ampleur.
